text: The 1927 New Mexico A&M; Aggies football team was an American football team that represented New Mexico College of Agriculture and Mechanical Arts (now known as New Mexico State University) during the 1927 college football season. In their first year under head coach Ted Coffman, the Aggies compiled a 3–5 record and shut out four opponents. The team played its home games on Miller Field, sometimes also referred to as College Field.2018 Media Guide, p. 15. ==Schedule== ==References== New Mexico AandM Category:New Mexico State Aggies football seasons New Mexico AandM Aggies football
title: 1927 New Mexico A&M Aggies football team
